attributes.action: Cancel the right of Irish Republic Citizens to vote in the U.K, E.U. Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Please see the news paper " the Irish World ", the family paper of Irish people in Britain ,
issue No : 1502 d/d 30 January 2016,
Taoiseach Kenny's policy speech is reported on pages 4 and 5
attributes.background: After meeting with PM David Cameron, the Irish Taoiseach Enda Kenny, addressed the British Irish chamber of commerce, he said that the Irish vote in the UE Referendum would determine its outcome, and the Irish should vote to stay in the EU, and that is  in Irelands Interest to do so
